channel.title: Latest News on InLab - Inference Laboratory
channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on InLab - Inference Laboratory

item.title: Espresso presentation at EGU 2023 by Andrew Valentine
item.description: If you have an inverse problem you would like to share or are looking for a test case for your inference algorithm then Espresso might be for you.

item.title: Sub22 CoFI Workshop
item.description: InLab held its first hands-on public workshop centred around CoFI at the National Wine Centre in Adelaide with attendees from industry, government and academia.

item.title: IAMG 2022 CoFI Poster
item.description: Begin exploring the development version of CoFI by heading to Colab

item.title: CoFI
item.description: The development of CoFI is now being supported through an AuScope 2021 Pilot Project.

item.title: 2020 Gutenberg Lecture
item.description: The American Geophysical Union has awarded the 2020 Gutenberg Lecture to Prof.
